### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=1.0), boiler(position x=1.5, y=3.0), offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe-group(position x=1.5, y=-6.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0) and pipe-group(position x=-24.5, y=30.5)

### Water supply system at position(x=-20.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-18.5, y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe-group(position x=-20.5, y=25.5)

### Pipe network at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5)
Consists of pipe-group(position x=3.5, y=-2.5), pipe-group(position x=1.5, y=-6.5), pipe-group(position x=-12.5, y=25.5) and pipe-group(position x=-5.5, y=25.5)

### Electricity distribution system at position(x=5.9, y=1.1)
Consists of electricity-group(position x=5.9, y=1.1) and small-electric-pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
- Check the item quantity before inserting into the inventory

### Errors when boiler is not working
- Check the boiler's fuel level and input liquid
- Ensure the boiler is connected to a fluid system and has a steam output point

### Errors when pipe-group is empty
- Check the pipe-group's fluid system and connection points
- Ensure the pipe-group is connected to a fluid source and has a valid fluid flow path

### Errors when offshore pump is not working
- Check the offshore pump's direction and position
- Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a fluid system and has a valid fluid flow path

### Errors when entity is not connected
- Check the entity's connection points and neighbours
- Ensure the entity is connected to a valid network or system
